content.question: Which of the following allows an individual to gain from unexpected inflation?

choices.label: Lending money at a fixed interest rate
Borrowing money at a fixed interest rate
Saving money in a fixed-interest-rate savings account

content.answer: Borrowing money at a fixed interest rate
